title: Intro Neuroengineering
description: An introduction to the intersection between neuroscience and neurotechnology, including identification of key aspects of the nervous system as the basis for measurement and intervention.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: (BIOS 4401 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or PSYC 2020 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D) and (CS 1301 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or CS 1371 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D)
